channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 05:34 Alarm response in Kirovohrad region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 05:34 Alarm response in Kirovohrad region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Кировоградська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 04:19 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Myriv territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 🟡 04:19 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Myriv territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
